Posts.Title: boosts?? zschweeb zschweeb

Posts.Content: zschweeb wrote: i am just about finished my first 26 sessions of rads after that is done they will do 7 boosts...my rads took about ten minutes there were 4 angles the full breast, under the arm, nodes in the neck, and nodes in the back  with all the changing angles and everything it was a bout 10 mins daily...my question when they are just doing the boosts how long will that take do they only aim directly at the lumpectomy site and give you one zap and its over that should only take a minute or two ...am i right??? thanx for the help....... Posts.Title: chemopause zschweeb zschweeb

Posts.Content: zschweeb wrote: just a quick question i know we are all different....i am 42 years old i have finished my chemo (DD ACT) on may 5, after my 2nd dose of chemo my periods stopped...after seeing my gyn while i was still having chemo he informed me that because i was still fairly young there was a good chance that my periods would return...i am over two months out from the end of my tx and was wondering how long it would take if hthey did indeed come back ... has anyone had a recurrence of their periods after chemo and how long did it take...i know it sounds like i really miss having them but i really dont ...just would like a little heads up Susan Dx 11/27/2007, IDC, 1cm, Stage II, Grade 3, 14/16 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
